Boulder.Crossroads Mall (Boulder):
The Crossroads Mall was an indoor shopping mall from 1963 until 2004, in Boulder, Colorado.


== History ==


=== Development ===
Crossroads Mall opened on March 14, 1963 with 394,000 leasable square feet for retail stores, surrounded by open-air parking. Anchor stores included The Randall Shop, a The Denver Dry Goods Company, J. C. Penney and Montgomery Ward In August 1979, Macerich acquired Crossroads Mall for $12 million.
